title: Interactive Compass Rose
description: An interactive compass rose simulation where students identify and apply cardinal and intermediate directions through explore and quiz modes with landmark associations.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Geography
Map Skills
Directions
learningObjectives: Identify all eight compass directions (N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW)
Name the four cardinal and four intermediate directions
Locate directions on a compass rose
Apply directional knowledge using landmark associations

accessibility.description: Interactive compass rose with 8 directions. Explore mode shows landmarks, Quiz mode tests direction knowledge.

controls.label: Explore
controls.description: Switch to explore mode - click directions to learn about them

controls.label: Quiz
controls.description: Switch to quiz mode - test direction knowledge

assumptions: North is at the top of the compass rose (standard map orientation)
Landmarks are simplified representations for learning associations
limitations: Does not include all 16 or 32 compass points
Landmarks are fictional associations for memory, not real locations
